title: Disconnected from all the matches I join?
body: Im not sure what happens to my account, cause everytime i want to join a match ,after I pick my champion, it disconnects me and sais that the game is still in progress.Im worried about this mainly because I am taking a lot of  AFK punishments(now they are around 20 min).Someone please help me if you know the solution!Thx for attention:))))

replies.body: Aw no ><  It sounds like your these games are starting without you, and marking you as a leaver.  You should stick to custom games for now while troubleshooting to not accrue anymore punishments.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help you out, I particularly recommend configuring your DNS and port forwarding to help clear up snags with your routing trying to reach us.  I hope that helps!
